Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Fva3 (Api-like PrAMPs, natural AMPs-like, Pro-rich, UCLL1, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (82.35%) toB. pascuorum apidaecinP: 41%, R: 18%. GRAVY: -1.05; Mol Wt: 1936.298; mol formula: C90H142N28O20;  mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against active against E. coli BL21 (MIC 1-8 uM) and K. pneumoniae AR-0112 (MIC 1 uM) in 33% TSB and not detected in RPMI/serum. Warning: non-standard assay. other bacteria not tested.
